page.title: 18If I had to hide.
page.content: (Based on the idea of being on the run in the local area).If I could I'd go to{WOODS CORNER.}I would go there because it would bring back happy memories of when I went there for picnics. I would also go there because it is almost invisible, hidden by thick green shrubs and tall dark ferns. I would hide in the old tower made of grey cold stone. The tower was built by {Mad Jack Fuller}in the 18th century. I would go right to the top part of the tower where I could see everything. I could even see over the top of the tall, thick fens. All around the tower are fields, all different shades of green and brown. It looked just like a patchwork quilt joined together by hedges and fences. I would watch the trees swaying to and fro in the wind and daydream. {JOANNA WIDDOP.}
